goals.complete: Agent Ifwyn and I infiltrated the Molenheide dredge mine and brought back key parts of the prototype sonic cannon for study. We took this information back to the other order reps in Hoelbrak to decide on our next move.

goals.active: Confer with Eir and the order reps in Hoelbrak.
goals.complete: I reported what Ifwyn and I found at Molenheide to Eir and the order reps. We agreed that Vyacheslav's new sonic cannon is too dangerous, so we set out to deprive him of it.
